kulami.connectivity

Interface InProtocolObserver


  • public interface InProtocolObserver
    Each object that wants to handle incoming server messages has to implement the InProtocolObserver interface.

    The names of the methods roughly correspond to server messages and the parameters to server message parameters. Question marks in server message names are replaced by the letter 'Q' in method names.

    Author:
    gordon

    • Method Detail

      • kulamiQ

        void kulamiQ()
        Server sent "Kulami?" Connection was successfully established. Continue protocol by sending the user name.

      • message

        void message(java.lang.String msg)
        Server sent a message. The message is displayed to the user.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message

      • spielparameterQ

        void spielparameterQ()
        Server asked for game parameters. (We are player 1.)

      • spielparameter

        void spielparameter(java.lang.String boardCode,
                  int level,
                  char colour,
                  java.lang.String opponentName)
        Server sent the game parameters. (We are player 2.) Create a GameMap, a Player, and a Game and start displaying the game.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - the 200-character map code.
        level - the game level (0, 1, or 2)
        colour - the player's colour ('b' for black or 'r' for red).
        opponentName - the name of the opponent.

      • name

        void name(java.lang.String opponentName)
        Server sent name of player 2. (We are player 1). Set the display accordingly.
        Parameters:
        opponentName - The name of the opponent.

      • farbe

        void farbe(char colour)
        Server sent colour. (We are player 1.) The Player object and the Game object can now be created and the display adjusted.
        Parameters:
        colour - 'b' for black or 'r' for red.

      • spielstart

        void spielstart(char colour)
        Server sent signal to start the game. The argument is the colour of the player who begins.
        Parameters:
        colour - 'b' for black or 'r' for red.

      • ungueltig

        void ungueltig(java.lang.String msg)
        Server complained about an illegal move. The argument indicates the reason.
        Parameters:
        msg - Reason for illegal move.

      • gueltig

        void gueltig(java.lang.String boardCode)
        Server sent new board in response to a legal move.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - new board code

      • zug

        void zug(java.lang.String boardCode)
        Server sent opponent's move.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - new board code

      • spielende

        void spielende(int pointsRed,
             int pointsBlack)
        Server signaled that the game is over and sends the final points.
        Parameters:
        pointsRed -
        pointsBlack -

      • playerMessage

        void playerMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Opponent sent a message via the server.
        Parameters:
        msg -

      • unknownMessage

        void unknownMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Server sent an unknown message. The parameter contains the message.
        Parameters:
        msg - unknown message text

      • connectionError

        void connectionError()
        An error occurred while communicating with the server.
